scripts.dev:server: nodemon -e js,jsx,html --ignore dist/ --ignore app/imported.js --exec 'yarn build && yarn start'
scripts.build: rimraf dist && yarn generate-imported-components && yarn create-bundles
scripts.create-bundle:client: cross-env BABEL_ENV=client parcel build app/index.html -d dist/client --public-url /dist/client
scripts.create-bundle:server: cross-env BABEL_ENV=server parcel build server/index.js -d dist/server --public-url /dist --target=node
